messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lewis, with the assistance of Chauffer Rodney Robinson, moved the decedent's body. Technician Muhammad collected evidence at the scene. Sergeant McMullen briefed Detective Morton on the case specifics. Crime Lab Technician Tamika Rogers conducted tests pertinent to the investigation. Detective David Trehan submitted reports classifying the incidents as homicides. Detective Aucoin secured the crime scene and coordinated with Coroner's Office. Detective Morton led the investigation, interviewing witnesses Darceleen Commodore and Earlitta Taylor, and received updates from Detective Ryan Aucoin on the Crime Lab findings. Detective Sergeant Chris Robert, Officer Juan Lopez, Officers Phil Burras & Quincy Broaden, Officers Nate Addison & Glen Hewitt, Detective Gregory Johnson, Detective Jason McGee, Detective Ananie Mitchell, Detective Melvin McCullum, and Detective Pratt of the Homicide Section are all mentioned as involved in various capacities.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Assisted by Chauffer Rodney Robinson in moving the decedent's body.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Collected evidence at the scene.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Briefed Detective Morton on the case specifics.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Crime Lab Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Context: Conducted tests pertinent to the investigation.Officer Role: Crime Lab TechnicianOfficer Name: Detective David TrehanOfficer Context: Submitted reports classifying the incidents as homicides.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective AucoinOfficer Context: Secured the crime scene and coordinated with Coroner's Office.Officer Role:
